item.description:
In order to celebrate World Wide Knit in Public Day, we will be meeting for a picnic on the State House Lawn, weather permitting.  If it's raining, we'll head back to Books a Million. Bring your own drinks and snacks and a chair or blanket and of course, your knitting.

Come and knit with your knit sibs!!! Please remember that this event is for adults only!  For newbies, a lot of our members do not RSVP.  So even though only two people may have responded, we generally have a lot more people show up.  So don't let the RSVP rate discourage you from coming :)
item.name: World Wide Knit in Public Day/Sunday Afternoon Gathering!!
